configMenu.Hint: Packages can register a debug mode setting which will appear below. Checking it or setting a log level will enable more detailed output in the console.

autoOpen.hint: Register Documents that you want to automatically open Sheets for on World load here.

performance.hint: This is a set of experimental tests for gauging how well your world/server performs. It can be useful to compare against different configurations on the same hardware (e.g. with and without a module on, etc).

actorCRUD.label: Actor CRUD Test
actorCRUD.hint: Runs Actor.create, update, and delete repeatedly, outputs how long the total operation takes, as well as average per operation.

compatibility.hint: Enter a comma-separated list of regular expressions to match against the stack trace of the compatibility warning logs. Any log that matches the included patterns will be included, and any log that matches the exclude patterns will be excluded.

config-menu.Name: Debug Flag Config
config-menu.Label: Debug Flags
config-menu.Hint: Every core debug flag and modules you have activated might register flags for their own debugging which you can toggle here.

disable-template-cache.Name: Disable Template Cache?
disable-template-cache.Hint: Disables the Foundry Core template cache, allowing any template changes to be picked up when `getTemplate` is rerun(Poor man's Hot-reload for handlebars files). Requires Reload

override-config-debug.Name: Override CONFIG.debug?
override-config-debug.Hint: Whether or not to use the dev-mode override settings for CONFIG.debug flags. Setting to false will cause a reload.

show-chat-ids.Name: Show Chat Message Ids?
show-chat-ids.Hint: Places a clickable chip on chat messages to copy the id or print the document to the console. Requires Reload

show-directory-ids.Name: Show Sidebar Directory Ids?
show-directory-ids.Hint: Places a clickable chip on sidebar directory entries to copy the id or print the document to the console. Requires Reload

show-compendium-ids.Name: Show Compendium Document Ids?
show-compendium-ids.Hint: Places a clickable chip on compendium directory entries to copy the id.

suppress-too-small.Name: Suppress Window Size Warning
suppress-too-small.Hint: Suppresses the window size warning on startup.

always-unpause.Name: Always Unpause
always-unpause.Hint: The game will always unpause when starting.

json-diff-system.Name: System JSON changes
json-diff-system.Hint: Notify about system.json and template.json changes.

json-diff-modules.Name: Module JSON changes
json-diff-modules.Hint: Notify about module.json changes on any and all active modules.

inspect-system-template.Name: Inspect template.json
inspect-system-template.Hint: Does basic checks on template.json for potential issues on load.

app-header-button.Name: Show App Header Button?
app-header-button.Hint: Places a Header Button on document sheets to print the document to the console. Requires Reload

hooks.Name: Hooks
hooks.Hint: Turning this on will console log all hooks as they fire while you interact with the Foundry UI.

keybindings.Name: Keybindings
keybindings.Hint: Turning this on will console log all keybinding events as they fire while you interact with the Foundry UI.

polygons.Name: Polygons
polygons.Hint: Turning this on will print debugging polygons on the canvas. Relates to vision, sound, and LOS.

unregistered.Label: Unregistered
unregistered.Hint: Template document types defined but lack registered sheet.

untemplated.Label: Untemplated
untemplated.Hint: Registered document types not found in template.

undefined.Label: Undefined
undefined.Hint: Templates referred to in types but not defined.
